name: Kryptoblaze
description:
This is a top down shooter game in which you are the last hope of the humanity . Only you can save the world from darkness  by killing the monsters which are lurking in the world by shooting them with magical wand. The game have total of 5 levels including the boss level.

RULES

1)  tap left mouse button to shoot  and use mouse to change the direction of wand.

2) Find magical orb inside the chest and open the portal to the next level.

3) Complete all the levels and kill the final boss to save the world and win.
